io.micronaut.function.aws.proxy

Class MicronautLambdaContainerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.function.aws.proxy.AbstractLambdaContainerHandler<com.amazonaws.serverless.proxy.model.AwsProxyRequest,com.amazonaws.serverless.proxy.model.AwsProxyResponse,MicronautAwsProxyRequest<?>,MicronautAwsProxyResponse<?>>
      • io.micronaut.function.aws.proxy.MicronautLambdaContainerHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.context.ApplicationContextProvider, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class MicronautLambdaContainerHandler
extends AbstractLambdaContainerHandler<com.amazonaws.serverless.proxy.model.AwsProxyRequest,com.amazonaws.serverless.proxy.model.AwsProxyResponse,MicronautAwsProxyRequest<?>,MicronautAwsProxyResponse<?>>
implements io.micronaut.context.ApplicationContextProvider, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Main entry for AWS API proxy with Micronaut.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    graemerocher
